name: One Night At Derp Tree 5
description:
Greetings from the Peace Team 🎅 

The One Night At Derp Tree Series was a Fnaf Fan series I made as a kid on Scratch. Due to the attention they got and the fact, there is still a small fanbase for the series I have decided to return. Hopefully, this final game is an improvement to the originals and provides a good ending for ONADT.

The Original Games: (Warning officially I'm not a fan of my old content)
Onadt 1 = https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/68083222/
Onadt 2 = https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/70852812/
Onadt 3= https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/74568920/
Onadt 4 = https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/235781549
Onadt 5= https://gamejolt.com/games/onadt5/756536
